headline.print_headline: Anger Spreads With 5 Attacks on Israelis
headline.main: Anger Spreads With 5 Attacks on Israelis

snippet: Palestinians had stabbed or attempted to stab five Israelis, most of them members of the security forces, according to the police and the military.
abstract: Anxieties rise in Jerusalem due to one day tally of five attacks by Palestinians, including Jewish settler and security force members; three assaults occurred in West Bank city of Hebron, one in Jerusalem, and another at Qalandia checkpoint near Ramallah.
lead_paragraph: Palestinians had stabbed or attempted to stab five Israelis, most of them members of the security forces, according to the police and the military.
